A diet rich in fiber, fermented foods, and psychobiotics supports healthy gut bacteria, which in turn produce beneficial compounds like serotonin.

content.body: Psychobiotics are specific strains of probiotics that influence mental well-being by enhancing gut health. These beneficial bacteria support neurotransmitter production and immune health, regulating stress responses and mood.
